title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 5 - Handling And Sale Of Products Made From Recovered Milk Fat And Solids
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 5 - Handling And Sale Of Products Made From Recovered Milk Fat And Solids

State Regulations
§ 5.1 - Definitions
§ 5.2 - The use and sale of unclean, unwholesome milk drippings, milk rinsings, mixtures, whey, or combinations thereof prohibited
§ 5.3 - The handling of mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings and whey
§ 5.4 - Labeling of containers of milk drippings, milk rinsings, mixtures or combinations thereof
§ 5.5 - The use of mixtures, milk rinsings, milk drippings, whey and milk fat and other milk solids recovered therefrom
§ 5.6 - Milk drippings, milk rinsings, mixtures or whey to be used for feeding domestic animals to be heated

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 1, ch. I, subch. A, pt. 5

Statutory authority: Agriculture and Markets Law, §§47-a, 214-b

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
